name: Text to Speech - US Accent
title: Text to Speech - US Accent

api_list.name: Get Styles
api_list.description: This endpoint is used to get all styles that can be passed to endpoint generate audio with different styles, where it is applicable...
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://text-to-speech-us-accent1.p.rapidapi.com/api/texttospeech/GetStyles"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-to-speech-us-accent1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://text-to-speech-us-accent1.p.rapidapi.com/api/texttospeech/GetStyles"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-to-speech-us-accent1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
